articles.content: Shares of GAIL (India) Ltd. traded 0.8 per cent higher in Thursday's session at 10:20AM (IST). The stock opened at Rs 138.0 and has touched an intraday high and low of Rs 139.5 and Rs 137.55, respect… [+1282 chars]
